verses.verse: And as He <S%G3855>passed<s%> by, He <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%> from <S%G1079>birth.<s%>

And His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4461>"Rabbi,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G264>sinned,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> his <S%G1118>parents,<s%> that he should be <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "[It was] <S%G3777>neither<s%> [that] <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G264>sinned,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> his <S%G1118>parents;<s%> but [it was] in <S%G2443>order<s%> that the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> might be <S%G5319>displayed<s%> in him.

"We <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2038>work<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of Him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me, as <S%G2193>long<s%> as it is <S%G2250>day;<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> is <S%G2064>coming,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2038>work.<s%>
<S%G3752>"While<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"

When He had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> He <S%G4429>spat<s%> on the <S%G5476>ground,<s%> and <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G4081>clay<s%> of the <S%G4427>spittle,<s%> and <S%G2007>applied<s%> the <S%G4081>clay<s%> to his <S%G3788>eyes,<s%>

and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G5217>"Go,<s%> <S%G3538>wash<s%> in the <S%G2861>pool<s%> of <S%G4611>Siloam<s%>" <S%G3739>(which<s%> is <S%G2059>translated,<s%> <S%G649>Sent<s%>). And <S%G3767>so<s%> he <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> and <S%G3538>washed,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> [back] <S%G991>seeing.<s%>

The <S%G1069>neighbors<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4387>previously<s%> <S%G2334>saw<s%> him as a <S%G4319>beggar,<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Is not <S%G3778>this<s%> the one who used to <S%G2521>sit<s%> and <S%G4319>beg<s%>?"

<S%G243>Others<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> is he," [still] <S%G243>others<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3780>"No,<s%> but he is <S%G3664>like<s%> him." He kept <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I <S%G1510>am<s%> the one."
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> they were <S%G3004>saying<s%> to him, <S%G4459>"How<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> were your <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%>?"

He <S%G611>answered,<s%> "The <S%G444>man<s%> who is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G4081>clay,<s%> and <S%G2025>anointed<s%> my <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G5217>'Go<s%> to <S%G4611>Siloam,<s%> and <S%G3538>wash<s%>' ; <S%G3767>so<s%> I <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> and <S%G3538>washed,<s%> and I <S%G308>received<s%> <S%G308>sight.<s%>"
And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4226>"Where<s%> is He?" He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I do not <S%G3609>know.<s%>"
They <S%G71>brought<s%> to the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> him who was <S%G4218>formerly<s%> <S%G5185>blind.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> it was a <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> on the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3739>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G4081>clay,<s%> and <S%G455>opened<s%> his <S%G3788>eyes.<s%>

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> were <S%G2065>asking<s%> him <S%G4459>how<s%> he <S%G308>received<s%> his <S%G308>sight.<s%> And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "He <S%G2007>applied<s%> <S%G4081>clay<s%> to my <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> and I <S%G3538>washed,<s%> and I <S%G991>see.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> is not from <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> He does not <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G4521>Sabbath.<s%>" But <S%G243>others<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4459>"How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> who is a <S%G268>sinner<s%> <S%G2038>perform<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%>?" And there was a <S%G4978>division<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them.

They <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to the <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>man<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do you <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> Him, <S%G3754>since<s%> He <S%G455>opened<s%> your <S%G3788>eyes<s%>?" And he <S%G3004>said,<s%> "He is a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>"

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> did not <S%G4100>believe<s%> [it] of him, that he had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> and had <S%G308>received<s%> <S%G308>sight,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> they <S%G5455>called<s%> the <S%G1118>parents<s%> of the <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G846>one<s%> who had <S%G308>received<s%> his <S%G308>sight,<s%>

and <S%G2065>questioned<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Is <S%G3778>this<s%> your <S%G5207>son,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> you <S%G3004>say<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%>? <S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> does he <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G991>see<s%>?"
His <S%G1118>parents<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "We <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> is our <S%G5207>son,<s%> and that he was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G5185>blind;<s%>

but <S%G4459>how<s%> he <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G991>sees,<s%> we do not <S%G3609>know;<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> his <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> we do not <S%G3609>know.<s%> <S%G2065>Ask<s%> him; he is of <S%G2244>age,<s%> he shall <S%G2980>speak<s%> for <S%G1438>himself.<s%> "

His <S%G1118>parents<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews;<s%> for the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> had <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G4934>agreed,<s%> that <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> should <S%G3670>confess<s%> Him to be <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> he should be <S%G656>put<s%> out of the <S%G656>synagogue.<s%>
For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> his <S%G1118>parents<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "He is of <S%G2244>age;<s%> <S%G2065>ask<s%> him."

<S%G3767>So<s%> a <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1208>time<s%> they <S%G5455>called<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1325>"Give<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to <S%G2316>God;<s%> we <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> is a <S%G268>sinner.<s%>"

He <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G1487>"Whether<s%> He is a <S%G268>sinner,<s%> I do not <S%G3609>know;<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1520>thing<s%> I do <S%G3609>know,<s%> that, whereas I was <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> I <S%G991>see.<s%>"
They <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to him, <S%G5101>"What<s%> did He <S%G4160>do<s%> to you? <S%G4459>How<s%> did He <S%G455>open<s%> your <S%G3788>eyes<s%>?"

He <S%G611>answered<s%> them, "I <S%G3004>told<s%> you <S%G2235>already,<s%> and you did not <S%G191>listen;<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> [it] <S%G3825>again<s%>? You do not <S%G2309>want<s%> to <S%G1096>become<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2532>too,<s%> do you?"
And they <S%G3058>reviled<s%> him, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "You are His <S%G3101>disciple,<s%> but we are <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses.<s%>
"We <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to <S%G3475>Moses;<s%> but as for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man,<s%> we do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> He is from."

The <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1063>"Well,<s%> <S%G1722>here<s%> <S%G3778><s%> is an <S%G2298>amazing<s%> <S%G2298>thing,<s%> that you do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> He is from, and [yet] He <S%G455>opened<s%> my <S%G3788>eyes.<s%>

"We <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> does not <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G268>sinners;<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> is God-fearing, and <S%G4160>does<s%> His <S%G2307>will,<s%> He <S%G191>hears<s%> him.

<S%G1537>"Since<s%> the <S%G165>beginning<s%> of <S%G165>time<s%> it has <S%G3756>never<s%> been <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of a <S%G5185>person<s%> <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G5185>blind.<s%>
<S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> were not from <S%G2316>God,<s%> He <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3756>nothing.<s%> <S%G3762><s%>"

They <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "You were <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G3650>entirely<s%> in <S%G266>sins,<s%> and are you <S%G1321>teaching<s%> us?" And they <S%G1544>put<s%> him out.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that they had <S%G1544>put<s%> him out; and <S%G2147>finding<s%> him, He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Do you <S%G4100>believe<s%> in the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%>?"
He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "And <S%G5101>who<s%> is He, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that I may <S%G4100>believe<s%> in Him?"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "You have <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> Him, and He is the one who is <S%G2980>talking<s%> with you."
And he <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> I <S%G4100>believe.<s%>" And he <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> Him.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "For <S%G2917>judgment<s%> I <S%G2064>came<s%> into <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> that <S%G3588>those<s%> who do not <S%G991>see<s%> may <S%G991>see;<s%> and that <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G991>see<s%> may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5185>blind.<s%>"

<S%G3588>Those<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> who were with Him <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "We are not <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G2532>too,<s%> are we?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1487>"If<s%> you were <S%G5185>blind,<s%> you would <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G266>sin;<s%> but <S%G3568>since<s%> you <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'We <S%G991>see,<s%>' your <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G3306>remains.<s%>
